V03vinv09_u:35_2: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃgha evaṃnāmnaḥ saṃghasāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ dadyād iti /

V03vinv09_u:36_1: so 'yam evaṃnāmā sāmagrīdattakaḥ saṃghāt sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ yācate /
V03vinv09_u:36_2: tat saṃgha evaṃnāmnaḥ sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ dadāti /
V03vinv09_u:36_3: eṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamante evaṃnāmnaḥ sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ dātum* /
V03vinv09_u:36_4: te tūṣṇīm* / na kṣamante / bhāṣantām* / dattaḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmnaḥ sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaḥ /
V03vinv09_u:36_5: kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena / yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03vinv09_u:37_0: (MSV II 196) yasya saṃghena sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadho datto bhavati tena sārdhaṃ
V03vinv09_u:37_1_1: saṃghenaikatye niṣadya poṣadhaḥ kartavyaḥ pravāraṇā jñaptiḥ jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ
V03vinv09_u:37_2: nātra kaukṛtyaṃ karaṇīyam* / vyagrāḥ kurvanti sātisārā bhavanti /
V03vinv09_u:37_3: na ca punar bhikṣuṇā apoṣadhe poṣadham āgamayati /
V03vinv09_u:37_4: sātisāro bhavati / sthāpayitvā maṅgalyapoṣadhaṃ sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ vā /
